name: Necrosis (Lucas)
description:
A Ludum Dare 52 game

The Necrosis virus is destroying all crops. You need to stop them.

How to play
Sow and harvest as many plants as you can. Don't let the infected plants take all tiles. Eliminate all of them to win

Controls
Mouse Left Button: Select, confirm and harvest
Mouse Right Button: Harvest all adjacent tiles
Numeric Keys: Plant shortcuts
Tab: Tutorial

Megalukes, JeanKB and Wizorbe developed this game.
The source code will be available once voting ends.
